text:
On clothing in IT, especially at tech conferences: https://t.co/aVAzq9BQWj.

Thanks, @holly_cummins, for sharing your experiences & thoughts. Please, let's resist the urge to point out why we feel somebody else's outfit "doesn't fit in". If they feel comfy, who are we to judge?!
